key_talking_points: Edmonton's Cody Ceci receives a minor penalty for high-sticking Florida's Carter Verhaeghe at 0:37 of the first period. Florida will go on the power play.
The first minute of the game has seen a flurry of physical play, with several hits exchanged between the Oilers and Panthers.
for_commentary_agent.context: Florida gets an early power play. Discuss the impact of special teams on the game.

high_intensity_events.summary: Penalty: Cody Ceci (EDM) high-sticking at 00:37 (2 min)

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the power play opportunity and the earlier physical play. Get player info for Ceci and Verhaeghe.
